## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtLNG1, LNG1, TRM2</u>
- **Gene Name:** LONGIFOLIA1, TON1 Recruiting Motif 2
- **Description:**   longifolia1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [lng3/4]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced leaf and petiole size. Small rosettes. Reduced stem and silique length.
   - [lngq]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced leaf and petiole size. Reduced stem and seed length.  Reduced cell elongation in longitudinal direction.
